name: Bargain Platformer
description:
In Bargain Platformer you must choose a run size and try to finish it with the highest score possible.

To achieve that you must collect coins and get to the finish line as fast as possible.

Be careful though some jumps are hard and traps are everywhere.

Oh... and enemies lurk in the worst places.

Bargain Platformer features:

  • Cool pixel art assets and animations
  • Random generated run levels
  • Bonus levels
  • Special level conditions that affect gameplay
  • Several different traps and enemies
  • Sections with precise platforming
